data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=U81GbV53JvwQ7kNvgGquX96&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDBUczz8k8uudUbubTwrWakDvvYIuU-9siriFA0IGa0cA&oe=670BC30C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iYQoctbtux8Q7kNvgGBMeQb&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBsGPgQOOYKqPT5WIrylg7eZjOBziNmqpvabzcmFnRJWw&oe=670BC11F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=q7rig5IY-AgQ7kNvgGnovJG&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCfp0Z8Io0t77YQMbX-VcuIX6j-zWhTph0plWGB1b2klg&oe=670BA671)
